code: export var chatWithPatient=function chatWithPatient(waitList,patient){var filteredPatients=waitList.state.patients.filter(function(p){return p!==patient;});waitList.setState({patients:filteredPatients});};export var chatWithDoctor=function chatWithDoctor(waitList,chatPage){var patientList=waitList.state.patients;var patient={name:chatPage.state.name,id:chatPage.state.user.uid};patientList=patientList.filter(function(p){return p.id!==patient.id;});patientList.unshift(patient);waitList.setState({patients:patientList});};export var displayMessage=function displayMessage(message,chatPage){var avatar=chatPage.state.doctor?"https://img.icons8.com/wired/64/000000/medical-doctor.png":"https://img.icons8.com/ios/50/000000/consultation.png";var newMessage={"text":message,"id":chatPage.state.messages.length+1,"sender":{"name":chatPage.state.name,"uid":chatPage.state.user.uid,"avatar":avatar}};chatPage.state.messages.push(newMessage);};
